item.title: Ripley Oil Painting: WIP
item.author: itsbledley@posteo.com (Bledley)
item.description: I can see there’s still a lot of work to do on this. It’s a really small piece so the hair on Newt is particularly stressing me out. I will probably put it aside for a while and return to it later. Couldn’t stop thinking that I’m making Ripley look like Michael Jackson. Related Posts Small Gouache People Village Elder
